project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements

We will start small and increase the number as additional features are set up and activated. For October 2025, we are only using the summary and writing tools.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: Use of intelligent triage and AI suggested macros will enable the support team to reply to issues quicker, reducing overall time to resolve for tickets.
kpi_measurement_approach: The metric 'Average time to resolve (business hours)' will be tracked for support tickets thru Zendesk Analytics.  The target will be to have the monthly average less than 24 business hours (3 business days)

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements

project_name: Advanced AI Chat Support (via Zendesk Advanced AI Agent)
project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: With AI resolving basic support requests, support team members will be able to focus on higher-value customer tickets, tasks, and troubleshooting.
kpi_measurement_approach: Once AI Agents are live, we will use Zendesk Analytics to track the percentage of chats that are transferred to a live agent. In Oct 2025, 46% of chats were transferred to a live agent. The goal will be to reduce this to 25% within 12 months after launching Copilot.

project_name: Advanced AI Chat Support (via Zendesk Advanced AI Agent)
project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: AI agents should increase the number of issues that customers can self-solve.
kpi_measurement_approach: Zendesk tracks the tickets that customers mark as self-solved, so we will use this metric to track improvements.  In October 2025, we had 0% self-solved issues reported. Within 9 months of launching the AI Agent, we aim to increase this to 7%.

project_name: Advanced AI Chat Support (via Zendesk Advanced AI Agent)
project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: Provides intuitive AI-powered scheduling tools that encourage adoption. AI optimizer reduces manual scheduling effort while natural language editor lowers technical barrier to schedule management.
kpi_measurement_approach: Track % of users who adopt AI scheduling vs manual methods. Measure AI feature usage vs total scheduling operations. Target: 30% adoption by end of Q2 2026, 60% by Q3, 80%+ by Q4.
kpi_notes: % adoption based on EZFacility customer research: July peak (soccer fall + hockey dual crunch), spring pilot during baseball crunch, summer lull, Q4 in-season dip. Target: 65-70% by year-end. This is based on standard web search, not our actual data.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: AI automates complex scheduling decisions, conflict detection, and schedule optimization. Reduces time spent on manual schedule creation and conflict resolution by intelligently suggesting optimal schedules.
kpi_measurement_approach: Compare time spent before/after AI adoption per facility. Track average schedule creation time reduction. Target: 40% reduction in schedule creation time (hours saved).
kpi_notes: % time reduction based on schedule complexity research: Baseball spring (25-30%), summer camps (32%), soccer/hockey multi-league fall (50-55% peak). AI provides most value on complex resource-constrained schedules. This is based on standard web search, not our actual data.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: AI features provide competitive differentiation and customer value. Enables premium pricing for AI-enhanced plans. Improves customer retention through time-saving automation.
kpi_measurement_approach: Track upgrades to AI-enabled plans, customer retention improvements, and new customer acquisition attributed to AI features. Monitor revenue increase from AI-enhanced product tiers.
kpi_notes: % revenue increase follows value realization lag: upgrades occur AFTER crunch periods (Apr post-baseball, Aug post-soccer/hockey), peak Sep-Oct when ROI visible during season, strong Nov-Dec year-end renewals. This is based on standard web search, not our actual data.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: By automating routine processes in Salesforce, we’ll streamline workflows, reduce manual input, and enhance the accuracy and reliability of our data across teams.
kpi_measurement_approach: Total # of active automations.  We currently have 23 automations in place, with an additional 40 planned for completion by the end of Q2 2026.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: Will reduce the amount of time spent manually researching accounts, identifying specific risks along with professional service and upsell opportunities.  The time saved through automation and AI insights will also drive higher levels of targeted outbound activity.
kpi_measurement_approach: Weekly customer proactive touchpoints (emails, calls, and meetings).  Our goal is to raise weekly outreach from an average of 59 to 78 unique accounts, expanding our engagement reach and pipeline potential by the end of April 2026.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: The productivity gains will enable each Account Manager to effectively manage a larger customer base without increasing workload or risk of burnout, ensuring scalable growth and sustained service quality.
kpi_measurement_approach: Weekly tasks completed.  We currently complete an average of 155 account-related tasks per week and aim to increase that rate to 232 by the end of Q2 2026.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: The solution will enable customer support resources to concentrate their time to work on more complex problems which will driver more job satisfaction.
kpi_measurement_approach: Staff Satisfaction surveys will be conducted as we introduce the Agent and train it to work on, first, Low-IP tasks, and provide copilot support to the support representatives. WE CURRENTLY DO NOT HAVE A BASELINE. THIS WILL BE CONDUCTED PRIOR TO GOING LIVE WITH THE AGENT. IMPROVEMENT GOAL TBD.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: If the Agent is able to respond quickly and accurately 24x7 to these requests customers should be very happy with this increases speed of response. Additionally, as tickets occur, support staff will have more time to focus on delivering exceptional responses to customers to address their issues.
kpi_measurement_approach: We will track calls / Agent v calls / Rep and we will ask all callers working with the Agent to leave a short feedback note/rating to determine if this improves their perception of the service. Additonally our normal CSAT surveys will continue.

project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: Shifting low-IP tasks to an Agent will allow us to free up skilled representatives to spend more time on customers and tickets that need specialist attention. Our service capacity will grow faster than OPEX and drive improvements to our MR.
kpi_measurement_approach: Ticket count satisfactorily closed by Agent / Rep will be measures alongside the ticket count / costs to identify if the two are closely correlated. MR to increase from 5.2 to 7 by Q2 2026, equivelent to $<need amount> OPEX saving.

project_name: AI Knowledge Base search for Internal Employees
project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: The use of AI knowledge has a direct impact to agents ability to handle more cases.   Our current metrics for 2025 has had significant month-month fluctuations and needs to be consistent to meet client expectations
kpi_measurement_approach: Reduction in average case resolution times for cases opened in the previous reporting period (week).   Industry standard 12-24 Buisness hours.  Set goal of 18 (average)
kpi_notes: Average resolution time is 30 hrs YTD, goal is to get consistently at or below 18 hrs

project_name: AI Knowledge Base search for Internal Employees
project_category: L3.  AI-powered internal business process improvements
kpi_support_description: Teams can handle inquires with greater accuracy and speed, allowing the support agents to handle more calls within the day.
kpi_measurement_approach: Reduction in Average Call Handling time for Agents.   Reduce to the Industry Average of 8-10 mins (use average of 9 as the goal)
kpi_notes: AHT is 11.10 YTD, AHT target is 9 minutes

project_name: AI Knowledge Base search/chat for club staff in ASF
project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: The solution will enable ASF users to find answers from our knowledge base using an AI-supported search.  This will eliminate many general question tickets that typically go to the support team.
kpi_measurement_approach: We will track the number of customers using the AI.

project_name: AI Knowledge Base search/chat for club staff in ASF
project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: The AI knowledge-base search will provide fast answers to questions asked by club management and staff.  We would like to see the usage of this search increase over time as customers become more aware of it and trust the answers they are getting from the AI.
kpi_measurement_approach: We will track the number of questions handled by the AI.

project_name: AI Knowledge Base search/chat for club staff in ASF
project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: The solution will reduce the number of support tickets being sent in for general questions about the software, allowing support team members to handle more critical questions and tasks.
kpi_measurement_approach: Track the total number of cases opened by clubs for general product questions.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: The solution will provide members with chat support that can assist with general questions prior to escalating to support.
kpi_measurement_approach: The total number of members using the chat bot to get support.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: The solution will automate handling of answers to general questions.
kpi_measurement_approach: The total number of inquiries handled by the chat bot that could be handled without escalation to a support rep.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: For cases that require escalation, the chat bot will provide more information to clearly indicate the member request/issue. This will allow support to more efficiently respond and resolve member support cases.
kpi_measurement_approach: Average resolution time for member support cases

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: This solution will allow customers to more quickly generate content for email campaigns while remaining in the ClubOS platform.
kpi_measurement_approach: Percentage of customers using AI to create email campaigns vs total campaigns created

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: This solution will allow customers to more quickly generate content for email campaigns while remaining in the ClubOS platform.
kpi_measurement_approach: Total number of prompts sent into the AI to create email content.

project_category: L4.  Using AI to enhance existing customer-facing products
kpi_support_description: Customers have a set number of AI prompts each month, we can negotiate additional prompts on a customer by customer basis.
kpi_measurement_approach: Additional revenue from new customers or customers requesting additional AI prompts.

project_category: L5.  Entirely new product capabilities powered by AI
kpi_support_description: This solution will allow customers to automate the handling of inbound messages to the club.
kpi_measurement_approach: Total number of customers using the agent for inbound requests.

project_category: L5.  Entirely new product capabilities powered by AI
kpi_support_description: The AI will support automating workflows that previously required human intevention, we wil measure the number of requests that could be fully handled by the AI vs those that required escalation.
kpi_measurement_approach: The percentage of inbound messages that could be handled via automation / AI.

project_category: L5.  Entirely new product capabilities powered by AI
kpi_support_description: The solution eliminates the need for clubs to have certain staff available to handle inbound requests. We would charge additional fees to enable this functionality.
kpi_measurement_approach: Revenue from customers that upgrade to AI solution.

project_category: L1. Using external AI tools for basic internal productivity
kpi_support_description: Allows us to create all content in HubSpot and allows for one simple prompt that creates content that can be used accross many different channels (Facebook, LinkedIn, Email, blogs etc...)
kpi_measurement_approach: Current hours devoted to creating content vary from week to week but average around 4 hours per week. The goal is to cut that time in half with AI.
kpi_notes: In Beta. Additional Training with HubSpot support is on 11/7

project_category: L1. Using external AI tools for basic internal productivity
kpi_support_description: Better content will lead to more interest in COS Software.
kpi_measurement_approach: Current avg weekly demos is 5, the goal is to do 9 weekly new logo demos.

project_category: L1. Using external AI tools for basic internal productivity
kpi_support_description: We were able to eliminate our Belay marketing recource.
kpi_measurement_approach: Since eliminatingthe Belay resource, we are saving $35K annually.
